mapper.select: SELECT bill.`id` AS id, bill.`client_id` AS clientId, client.name AS clientName, bill.invoice_date AS invoiceDate, bill.drawer AS drawer, users.`name` AS drawerName, bill.invoice_num AS invoiceNum, bill.invoice_type AS invoiceType, dici.`name` AS invoiceTypeName, bill.`remarks` AS remarks, bill.create_by AS createBy, creater.`name` AS createByName, bill.`create_time` AS createTime, bill.auditor AS auditor, auditor.`name` AS auditorName, bill.`audit_time` AS auditTime, bill.audit_sign AS auditSign, dica.`name` AS auditSignName FROM scm_salesbill bill LEFT JOIN cus_client client ON client.id = bill.client_id LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary dici ON dici.id = bill.invoice_type LEFT JOIN sys_user users ON users.user_id = bill.drawer LEFT JOIN sys_user creater ON creater.user_id = bill.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user auditor ON auditor.user_id = bill.auditor LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary dica ON dica.id = bill.audit_sign WHERE bill.`id` = #{value}
